Ippak ûûwab i win i S Ihwan. Win iwumi ippunefk ûûwab, ni$ ippunefk as aîas n lxiô. Siwa uâqilen i ismektayen
Ayen tefkam useddeq, ne$ teqqnem n tuqqna, Öebbi, s tidep, Iéôa t. Ur llin imâiwnen i imednas
